name: Aiutoniet
description:
This is a small game for the Wowie game jam about a robot named Aiutoniet. He wants to get a ticket for the Wowie game jam. The robot isn't very smart. He moves right. Jumps ONLY if he sees a spike. So you have to help him by placing spikes on the ground.

Controls: 

Left click - place spike

R - reset level

There is a Windows version as a separate game https://kid-with-a-beard.itch.io/aiutonet-windows-version. Hope you enjoy the game.
